Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGOBE; RELIEF
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate-cone shaped lamp, circular in outline,with a disc set off by means of an incision and with a fragmented ribbon handle which starts at the orifice for fuelling and ends at the curvature in the middle of the body. Paste of an ochre colour. Surface covered with reddish-coloured coating, partially lost. On the disc, all around the opening for fuelling, we find a vegetal decoration in relief: flowers with four and six petals alternately. Signs of use in the light orifice.
